Package com.muss_and_toeberg.snake_that.technical

Contains all technical stuff like processors or enums

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AudioController
    controls everything related to sounds and music
    MainGame
    MainGame which controls screen changes and contains all "global" objects
    MemoryController
    controls everything related to saving and loading
    TouchInputProcessor
    Implementation of the InputProcessor makes it possible to react to the touching of the display
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HitDirection
    represents the direction, from which something was hit by the player
    Menu
    represents the current screen which is displayed
    SnakeColor
    represents the color of the snake
